message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $95.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $85. Let me know if this works for you.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but $85 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $87 for the product. Let me know if this is acceptable.
